title: *HOT* Under Armour Women’s Shorts as low as $7.18 shipped!
description: Whoa! This is such a hot deal on these Under Armour Women’s Shorts! Under Armour is offering an extra 40% off the sale items when you use the promo code EXTRA40 at checkout! Plus, shipping is free, no minimum! Note — the products with the “Limited Time: 25% Off Spring Essentials” listed in green are excluded from the promoRead More
author: Gretchen
